markdownRemark.html: This is a private golf club which allows non-members every day from 10h00 to 12h00 to play its magnificent golf course. The course is maintained well and in perfect condition. There is a Club House with all the facilities you need, a well equipped pro shop and a restaurant with very good food and service.

frontmatter.title: Real Club Valderrama
